content.rendered:
Stay with us and have Summit County's numerous MTB trails just minutes away!

Coming from Mexico or Canada? Take a zero day here and have every amenity nearby!

Nearby Trails

We are located just north of the large body of water (the Dillon Reservoir.)

For more information on trail conditions and the local mountain bike community: Check out the Summit County profiles on Trailforks and MTB Project! Please consider supporting the Summit County Mountain Bike Alliance.

Biking the Great Divide/Continental Divide?

The Great Divide Mountain Bike Route passes directly through Silverthorne, CO – a large town in central Colorado and a scant 2 mile ride to the hostel. 

Bike shops in the area include:

  • REI
  • Wilderness Sports
  • The Cove Bike & Ski
  • Gore Range Sports
Stay With Us
